(I'm not sure if cars can glide...)

Vehement:


Vehement saw a robot leap in the air in his general direction, and then a car 
coming towards him.  Raising his sword, he fired off three laser bolts at the 
underbelly of the car as it came toppling into his chest, sending him flying 
back several feet and crashing to the ground.
